name: Agent Stuart
description:
"Agent Stuart' is an action game. Help the cute little mouse 'Stuart'as he runs, shoots and destroys enemies and overcomes hurdles with nothing to lose! Don't be fooled by his small size, he may be small and cute but he's enough to cause a mayhem. Travel through portals to visit exotic world locations, battling Enemies.
Instantly playable and simple to control, the action speeds up and changes gears with every new world.
Run as far as possible and shoot Enemies along the way to amass high scores and collect awards. Upload your best runs to the GameCenter leader board.
Collect Coins to unlock new characters and Powers.

Features:

• Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth controls.

• Eye popping high definition 3D graphics

• Environments that change every few minutes you play.

• GameCenter leaderboards, achievements and challenges

• Easy but fun game mechanics.

• Hours of addictive gaming!

• Gorgeous HD graphics that really pop and unique music make Mouse Mayhem a feast for your eyes and ears.
